channel.title: joel on Trisha Gee

item.title: FogBugs and Kiln World Tour
item.description: Last Thursday I was fortunate enough to get a place on the FogBugz and Kiln World Tour. I booked it before I moved jobs, and I’ll be honest I had no real interest in the software. I’ve been reading Joel’s books and blogs since my friend Brent bought me Joel on Software and made me read it (he had the foresight to know I’d want to hang on to his copy if he’d lent it to me!). I wanted to see the man in the flesh and hear what he had to say about his software. Because really, do we honestly need yet another bug-tracking / project-management tool?
